statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT T1.DENPYO_BANGO ,T1.ADD_YMD ,T1.ADD_TM ,MT100_1_1.MEISYOKANA_NM KAISYA_CD ,MT100_1_2.MEISYOKANA_NM KAISYA_NM ,T1.TENPO_CD ,BOMT0010_1.TENPO_NM ,T1.ADDTAN_CD ,BOMT0030_1.HANBAIIN_NM ,T1.SIIRESAKI_CD ,MDMT0020_1.SIIRESAKI_RYAKU_NM ,T1.BUMON_CD ,BOMT0060_1.BUMONKANA_NM ,T1.HINSYU_CD ,MDMT0070_1.HINSYU_RYAKU_NM ,T1.BURANDO_CD ,STMT0500_1.BURANDO_NMK ,T1.SYONMK ,T1.MAKER_HBN ,T1.JAN_CD ,T1.JISYA_HBN ,MDMT0080_1.IRO_NM ,T1.SIZE_NM ,T1.SURYO ,(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(T1.TYOTATSU_KB, -1)) BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN 'NB' WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(T1.TYOTATSU_KB, -1)) = 9 THEN 'SMU' ELSE 'PB' END) TYOTATSUNM ,MT100_1_3.MEISYO_NM SIYOJYOKYO ,MT100_1_4.MEISYO_NM HINSITUHURYO ,MT100_1_5.MEISYO_NM HURYONAIYO FROM MDBT0120_1 T1 INNER JOIN MDMT0100_1 MT100_1_1 ON MT100_1_1.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'CONM' AND MT100_1_1.MEISYO_CD = '1' INNER JOIN MDMT0100_1 MT100_1_2 ON MT100_1_2.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND MT100_1_2.MEISYO_CD = MT100_1_1.MEISYOKANA_NM LEFT JOIN BOMT0010_1 ON T1.TENPO_CD = BOMT0010_1.TENPO_CD LEFT JOIN BOMT0030_1 ON T1.ADDTAN_CD = BOMT0030_1.HANBAIIN_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0020_1 ON T1.SIIRESAKI_CD = MDMT0020_1.SIIRESAKI_CD LEFT JOIN BOMT0060_1 ON T1.BUMON_CD = BOMT0060_1.BUMON_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0070_1 ON T1.BUMON_CD = MDMT0070_1.BUMON_CD AND T1.HINSYU_CD = MDMT0070_1.HINSYU_CD LEFT JOIN STMT0500_1 ON T1.BURANDO_CD = STMT0500_1.BURANDO_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0080_1 ON T1.IRO_CD = MDMT0080_1.IRO_CD INNER JOIN MDMT0100_1 MT100_1_3 ON MT100_1_3.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRSY' AND MT100_1_3.MEISYO_CD = T1.SIYOJOKYO_KB INNER JOIN MDMT0100_1 MT100_1_4 ON MT100_1_4.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRHS' AND MT100_1_4.MEISYO_CD = T1.HINSHITSUHURYO_KB INNER JOIN MDMT0100_1 MT100_1_5 ON MT100_1_5.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRHR' AND MT100_1_5.MEISYO_CD = T1.HURYO_KB WHERE 0 = 0

statement.name: final
statement.parts: UNION ALL SELECT T2.DENPYO_BANGO ,T2.ADD_YMD ,T2.ADD_TM ,MT100_2_1.MEISYOKANA_NM KAISYA_CD ,MT100_2_2.MEISYOKANA_NM KAISYA_NM ,T2.TENPO_CD ,BOMT0010_2.TENPO_NM ,T2.ADDTAN_CD ,BOMT0030_2.HANBAIIN_NM ,T2.SIIRESAKI_CD ,MDMT0020_2.SIIRESAKI_RYAKU_NM ,T2.BUMON_CD ,BOMT0060_2.BUMONKANA_NM ,T2.HINSYU_CD ,MDMT0070_2.HINSYU_RYAKU_NM ,T2.BURANDO_CD ,STMT0500_2.BURANDO_NMK ,T2.SYONMK ,T2.MAKER_HBN ,T2.JAN_CD ,T2.JISYA_HBN ,MDMT0080_2.IRO_NM ,T2.SIZE_NM ,T2.SURYO ,(CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(T2.TYOTATSU_KB, -1)) BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN 'NB' WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(T2.TYOTATSU_KB, -1)) = 9 THEN 'SMU' ELSE 'PB' END) TYOTATSUNM ,MT100_2_3.MEISYO_NM SIYOJYOKYO ,MT100_2_4.MEISYO_NM HINSITUHURYO ,MT100_2_5.MEISYO_NM HURYONAIYO FROM MDBT0120_2 T2 INNER JOIN MDMT0100_2 MT100_2_1 ON MT100_2_1.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'CONM' AND MT100_2_1.MEISYO_CD = '1' INNER JOIN MDMT0100_2 MT100_2_2 ON MT100_2_2.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'KASY' AND MT100_2_2.MEISYO_CD = MT100_2_1.MEISYOKANA_NM LEFT JOIN BOMT0010_2 ON T2.TENPO_CD = BOMT0010_2.TENPO_CD LEFT JOIN BOMT0030_2 ON T2.ADDTAN_CD = BOMT0030_2.HANBAIIN_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0020_2 ON T2.SIIRESAKI_CD = MDMT0020_2.SIIRESAKI_CD LEFT JOIN BOMT0060_2 ON T2.BUMON_CD = BOMT0060_2.BUMON_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0070_2 ON T2.BUMON_CD = MDMT0070_2.BUMON_CD AND T2.HINSYU_CD = MDMT0070_2.HINSYU_CD LEFT JOIN STMT0500_2 ON T2.BURANDO_CD = STMT0500_2.BURANDO_CD LEFT JOIN MDMT0080_2 ON T2.IRO_CD = MDMT0080_2.IRO_CD INNER JOIN MDMT0100_2 MT100_2_3 ON MT100_2_3.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRSY' AND MT100_2_3.MEISYO_CD = T2.SIYOJOKYO_KB INNER JOIN MDMT0100_2 MT100_2_4 ON MT100_2_4.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRHS' AND MT100_2_4.MEISYO_CD = T2.HINSHITSUHURYO_KB INNER JOIN MDMT0100_2 MT100_2_5 ON MT100_2_5.SIKIBETSU_CD = 'HRHR' AND MT100_2_5.MEISYO_CD = T2.HURYO_KB WHERE 0 = 0
